snippet: The widow of Sonny Bono was elected today to the United States House seat left vacant when the former entertainer was killed in a January skiing accident.    Mary Bono, a Republican, defeated Ralph Waite, a Democrat who was once the patriarch on '...
lead_paragraph: The widow of Sonny Bono was elected today to the United States House seat left vacant when the former entertainer was killed in a January skiing accident. Mary Bono, a Republican, defeated Ralph Waite, a Democrat who was once the patriarch on ''The Waltons'' television show, and four other candidates.
abstract: Mary Bono, widow of Sonny Bono, is elected to US House seat left vacant when he was killed in skiing accident; she defeats Democrat, actor Ralph Waite (S)

headline.main: Widow Wins Election to Fill Bono's Seat
